resources.string: Click here to import the apps, contacts, pictures, etc. from the Sender.
Click here to export the apps, contacts, pictures, etc. into the Receiver.
Starting WLAN hotspot
Clone stopped
For another device, click \"%s\"
For another device, click \"%s\"
Tip: If you need to clean up this device data to prevent loss of privacy, select [System Settings], restore factory settings
Multimedia file save to the same path as the Sender
Q1: How to import data into the Receiver from the Sender?
A: Respectively click \"Sender\" and \"Receiver\" to install \"CLONEit\" on both the two devices.

"A: The existing data on the Receiver won't be downloaded repeatedly. Once the imported contacts, SMS, etc. over the limit of storage space, the system will merge the data on the two devices, and then save the latest data."

"A: 1. After cloning, contacts, SMS, personal profile, etc. will be automatically saved to the Receiver.For example, contacts will be saved to the Contact List. 2. Photos, music, videos, etc. will be saved to the same directory as the Sender, and they may be played through using corresponding player software."
A: If the device has the ROOT permission, the system will automatically install and import/export all data. Please give permission to with ease.
Sender not found?
Receiver not found?
Install \"CLONEit\" on the Sender~
Open \"CLONEit\" on the Sender
Select \"Sender\"
Select \"Receiver\"
Wait to be found by Sender
"Please confirm on the old device: Open\"CLONEit\", enter into \"CLONEit\" Select \"Sender\""
OK, start using the new device
Operating Guide for the Sender
Import from the Sender(with zero traffic)
The Sender only supports Android system
Install CLONEit on the Sender
Open CLONEit on the Sender
"Open CLONEit on the Sender, Click CLONEit, and select 'Sender'"
Migrated later, start using new device
Say goodbye to the old device, contacts, text messages, photos, applications %1$s
Old device data will be migrated to this device(Zero traffic)
only Android devices supported
